channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- curl
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- curl

item.title: CVE-2017-2628|2024-08-05T14:02:06.934Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- curl
item.description: curl, as shipped in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 before version 7.19.7-53, did not correctly backport the fix for CVE-2015-3148 because it did not reflect the fact that the HAVE_GSSAPI define was meanwhile substituted by USE_HTTP_NEGOTIATE. This issue was introduced in RHEL 6.7 and affects RHEL 6 curl only.
